channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- EcoStruxure OPC UA Server Expert
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- EcoStruxure OPC UA Server Expert

item.title: CVE-2023-37200|2024-08-02T17:09:32.655Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20opc%20ua%20server%20expert
item.description: A CWE-611: Improper Restriction of XML External Entity Reference vulnerability exists that could cause loss of confidentiality when replacing a project file on the local filesystem and after manual restart of the server.
